text.text: Liaoningosaurus, a small ankyolosaur from the Cretaceous. This small ankyolosaur is from the Yixian Formation in China. It wouldn't fear too much other than the larger carnivore that could break through it's strong back.
The only studied Liaoningosaurus fossil was 34 centimeters, but proven to only be 1 year old. It would've lived a standard lifestyle, grazing on small plants
